column1: Today's the day to stay safe and shop small! So many of our favorite small businesses are making it easier to buy online during these tough times. Please take a moment to support your favorite local business! #ShopSmallSaturday

Thanksgiving is different this year but what hasn’t changed is my gratitude for you your family and everything you do for Michigan. I'm thankful because you give me hope that together we can get through even the most difficult challenges facing Michigan. #HappyThanksgiving

Michigan voters resoundingly chose @JoeBiden to be the next President by more than 150000 votes in a fair transparent election. The majority of the State Board of Canvassers did their jobs today. It's time to move forward to address the problems facing our state and country. https://t.co/Mx4Q2MIhP8
Happy birthday @DebDingell! Grateful for your friendship and strong voice fighting for Michigan!

It’s time to certify Michigan’s election and move on.  Our focus needs to be on helping people survive this pandemic and rebuild our communities and our democracy. Watch: https://t.co/w1JmWaJk8t  cc: @staceyabrams

Happy birthday President-elect @JoeBiden! Grateful for your leadership experience and friendship during this difficult time! Looking forward to being your partner as we build back better in 2021 and beyond! https://t.co/DyZ6VYkhRk
🙋‍♀️ https://t.co/qofmdO3Wro

Instead of our top GOP leaders working to protect Michigan against COVID-19 they are going to Washington D.C. to discuss how to ensure that hundreds of thousands of Michigan voters' voices are silenced.  https://t.co/Cws3NxUZWH
Voters in MI chose Joe Biden to be our next president by 150000 votes in a fair & transparent election. It’s time to move on.
Although this move by the Republicans on the Wayne County Board of Canvassers has no legal impact it underscores the lengths that Rs will go to in undermining our democracy.   https://t.co/mseOmw8eos

I want to thank every Michigan Veteran and military family from the bottom of my heart. Your service and sacrifice will never be forgotten. I am incredibly proud to go to work and fight for you every day in the United States Senate.  #VeteransDay https://t.co/lWn68PPpsV
This is history...actually Herstory!  And it’s about time! So proud of you @KamalaHarris. https://t.co/bVWBfZfhYW

We face many issues—from a deadly pandemic to the resulting economic fallout to the climate crisis. These issues don’t just affect red or blue states—they affect us all. There’s no one better than @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris to lead us as we tackle these challenges together.

After a long challenging campaign the people of Michigan and America have made our voices heard. And I truly believe that whether you voted for him or not President Biden will be a president for all Americans. We have no time to lose. https://t.co/J22B6LNO3b
We need to have Joe’s back. Let’s go! https://t.co/tp9PuMpsG7
So glad that my good friend and colleague @dankildee will be coming back to the House! You’re an incredible champion for working families in Michigan! https://t.co/nPH6FNsDw7
Thank you Michigan! I know @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris will work their hearts out for our state and our country. Here's to hearing more good news soon! https://t.co/AwNkbJa38x

He‘s always fought for what matters most to Michigan families – lowering drug prices protecting our Great Lakes investing in our roads & bridges & increasing training to help workers get good jobs.  It’s my honor to continue serving with Gary as the ‘1-2 punch’ for Michigan!

I am so pleased that my colleague and friend Gary Peters will continue to be my partner in the U.S. Senate!  Right now our nation and our state need strong steady leadership and that’s just what we’ll get with Gary Peters back in the United States Senate. https://t.co/6GFKgOmnUD
So proud of @HaleyLive! #MI11 and Michigan's autoworkers and manufacturers are fortunate to have you on their side! https://t.co/LGlAuqVM7v
Congrats to @BridgetMaryMc and @WelchForJustice! I know that you’ll put Michigan families first on the Michigan Supreme Court.
The people have voted. The votes are being counted. The democratic process is working in Michigan! https://t.co/yELGIKsLV7

Congrats to my friend and my own representative @ElissaSlotkin on your win! I know you will always do what’s best for our country and will continue to advocate for everyone in the #MI8! https://t.co/Qcnl5ubhMJ
Congrats @DebDingell! I'm glad that we can continue to work together on behalf of Michigan families! https://t.co/eN1dKmDO48
.@BrendaLLawrence way to go! Looking forward to continuing our work expanding community behavioral health for families! #MI14
Congrats @RashidaTlaib on your win! #MI13 is so lucky to have a passionate advocate in the House. https://t.co/GfQ232wdXt
Great job @Andy_Levin! Glad that you'll continue to stand up for workers and fight for families in Macomb and Oakland! https://t.co/swgPWNLpEd

I am confident ⁦@JoeBiden and ⁦@GaryPeters will win Michigan! There are more than 360000 votes still to be counted and we know over 60 percent of those have been breaking for Democrats. Michigan is on track!   ⁩https://t.co/LFU3C1JgYJ via @freepand

It’s Election Day and @KamalaHarris is back in Michigan! Kamala and @JoeBiden understand how important Michigan is! When we vote our families win - and our Democracy will remain strong! https://t.co/vrLP70KM37

It’s #ElectionDay and @gretchenwhitmer  and I are making one last push in Lansing. Thank you to all of the incredible volunteers who are working so hard for leaders who will heal our country and build back better! #Vote https://t.co/x9yMp4FnHb

If you still need to register it’s easy.  Just head to your local clerk’s office register and then fill out and submit your ballot before 8 tonight! If you have more questions about voting please go to https://t.co/FIjpt6Q8Nf! #VOTE

Don't forget you have until 8 p.m. to hand-deliver your completed absentee ballot to your local clerk’s office (NOT your polling place) or to a dropbox. Just make sure to sign your absentee ballot envelope! #VOTE
Polls are open across Michigan now until 8 pm! If you’re voting today in-person go to https://t.co/FIjpt6Q8Nf to find your polling place. #VOTE
The 1-2 punch for Michigan. Let’s make sure we get out and vote for @GaryPeters tomorrow and keep it that way! https://t.co/A9yCLUNtlk https://t.co/mFEATeGJOR
https://t.co/zp6gcmdONj https://t.co/B3k7tmPgNz

Another great backyard GOTV event in Brownstown with @gretchenwhitmer @GaryPeters @DebDingell and @darrincamilleri! Thank you Frank and Doreen for hosting us!  Tomorrow is Election Day.  We can stop the chaos! Vote! https://t.co/puN06WK245
Fun to have @kerrywashington join us in Detroit for a great GOTV rally. Very inspiring!  It’s time to vote Detroit! https://t.co/Zr7MAssgKu

Thanks @JeremyAllenMoss for hosting us in your backyard for a great Oakland County LGBTQ community GOTV rally. So much energy! So much at stake in this election!  It’s time to vote! https://t.co/62JduSsmv8 https://t.co/cN0EwedYAx
Macomb County volunteers rock! People standing in lines at the clerk’s offices to early vote today. It’s time to vote! https://t.co/q21t3liDMc
We’ve got one shot Michigan! Do not lose this opportunity! Go Vote! https://t.co/T7EuXoDTRf

Great to be in Pontiac with @WatermanDeirdre and dedicated volunteers.  Clerk’s office here is open until 8pm tonight!  Drop off your absentee ballot today!  It’s time to vote!! https://t.co/nCRt46HQdE
https://t.co/S4t9ef3S2m https://t.co/qcnTWk8F2s
Thanks UAW Local 699 for hosting us in Saginaw. Clerk’s office is open until 4pm today. It’s time to vote!! https://t.co/qxXh4XtPRS

Started our day in Bay City with a great GOTV crowd! Bay County clerk’s office is open until 5pm today. Time to drop-off your absentee ballot. Let’s repair our country together! https://t.co/WADzuT9Jb4
It’s cold and it’s windy but @darrincamilleri and amazing Downriver volunteers are knocking doors in Woodhaven to get out the vote.  Thank you! 2 more days!! https://t.co/N3IEnqXEu8
Thank you President @BarackObama for joining us in Michigan yesterday!  You always show us what leadership looks like. It’s time to vote Michigan! https://t.co/Oxa9B6fwAc

So great to have “the band back together again.” @BarackObama and @JoeBiden made us proud as Americans. President Joe Biden and Vice-President Kamala Harris will give us that feeling again....dedication to others competence and character. It’s time to vote! https://t.co/6mvtHKBofk
Great car rallies in Flint and Detroit for @JoeBiden and @GaryPeters! Lots of energy and excitement!  It’s time to #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/VbfAkWdZXh

#HappyHalloween! We're just 3 days from the most important election of our lifetime. Make a plan to return your ballot or vote in person. We need every eligible voter to vote! Find your clerk or dropbox: https://t.co/sTWwwcXHEF. https://t.co/foZeOvsq6l

Beautiful day on Belle Isle in Detroit! An exciting car rally with @BarackObama and @JoeBiden. No better way to start than with the Detroit Youth Choir. So proud of them. Don't forget to vote!! https://t.co/MJFgg8vPCS
3 days @GaryPeters! https://t.co/cEnC8VHAch
#HappyHalloween everyone! https://t.co/9mgSftQmdK
If you like @TotallyUnderControl and want others to watch make sure you share this link. https://t.co/HEecV7pZpe  #TotallyUnderControl

I’m so thankful for all of the essential workers who’ve kept our communities going during this pandemic. It should never have gotten to this point. We need leaders who listen to the experts & put our loved ones' health & safety above politics. #TotallyUnderControl
Yes! https://t.co/PgDh8dPDfZ

From the beginning of this pandemic I said that we needed a national testing strategy. #TotallyUnderControl shows the Trump administration's failure to use testing to slow the spread of COVID-19! #TotallyUnderControl

The Trump administration threw out the pandemic playbook. Then they eliminated key positions that deal with global health outbreaks.   @realDonaldTrump  chose politics over listening to experts that knew how to deal with a global pandemic. #TotallyUnderControl
That’s not leadership. That’s throwing up a white flag. We deserve better and with @JoeBiden we’ll get it. #TotallyUnderControl https://t.co/VuR9OMn0yT

Hey @BrianSchatz! The powerful film "Totally Under Control" is streaming free at https://t.co/1nQtErwqHs. Starting RIGHT NOW folks can watch-along with me  @JuddApatow @RickABright and @alexgibneyfilm using #TotallyUnderControl. Can you help get the word out?

Do you know what’s truly terrifying? Trump won Michigan by exactly 10704 — and if we don’t do everything we can to stop him he might even squeak by with victory again. So join the #FrightNightReunion and help defeat Trump!  Tune in at 8 PM at this link. https://t.co/ZPU7MKNnWL
Tonight we're hosting a live watch party for Totally Under Control by @alexgibneyfilm. Join us at 7 pm with the link below!  https://t.co/HEecV7pZpe

Great to be with @DrBiden today in East Lansing and Westland. She will be a wonderful First Lady with a lifetime of dedication as a teacher and advocate for public education. Please vote now - for our future! https://t.co/5x3WaXdT1Z
We need a President who understands how important the Great Lakes are to our Michigan way of life. That’s @JoeBiden! https://t.co/fq4O5SRS3z
6 Days! Proud to join @Andy_Levin @HaleyLive @DavidWCoulter @JeremyAllenMoss and the incredible @OneCampaignMI team for a canvass launch today in Madison Heights! https://t.co/bVPyAoVZe2

.@barbanness2020 will be a wonderful State Rep!  We need her passion for public education and health care now more than ever!  So glad @rosemarybayer could join us for this canvas kick-off on such a #PureMichigan day! https://t.co/28ZRbNYASS
Thank you @Jeff_Daniels! Every Michigander needs to watch this!   https://t.co/RiVXo50pT4
I just came from the floor of the United States Senate where I voted no on Amy Coney Barrett becoming a member of the #SupremeCourt. Please watch. https://t.co/rwlla54ouS
Please watch @undercontrolmov as soon as you can. It's important:  https://t.co/wlB6didiGB https://t.co/bws16AzsgX

Just left the floor after voting “no” on the motion to proceed to the confirmation of Amy Coney Barrett as a justice of the U.S. Supreme Court. Thinking of our beloved RBG and the radical step backward that this Republican Senate is going to be taking with the vote tomorrow. https://t.co/MhvOfy9hK8
Hey @CoryBooker I am helping Jon @ossoff but I won’t shave my head! 😂 https://t.co/8Br3L4UKks
Let’s create a new blue wave in Georgia! Let’s help Jon @ossoff crush this goal! https://t.co/KmNgEuHPnE
Thank you @jimmykimmel for sharing! Health care is definitely on the ballot!  It’s time to vote like our lives depend on it!  https://t.co/UGa25hlzqw
Yesterday on @MSNBC  I talked about a top priority for us in Michigan in 2020 - making sure my friend @GaryPeters wins his re-election fight. Please watch! #MiEarlyVote https://t.co/V6V4DepcPb
13 Days! Your voice and your vote have never been more important. #MiEarlyVote https://t.co/TkVzhB4QAa
Older Americans know that health care is on the line this election. We need leaders who understand that health care is personal not political. https://t.co/DWDI4i72AS
Thank you @BarackObama! @GaryPeters has always been there for Michigan - let's make sure we're there for him this November. Vote! https://t.co/uefWiNqomU

Did you say something about beating Ohio @ElissaSlotkin? You know I'm in. Jeh Johnson @PatinkinMandy Claire Danes and the rest of the @SHO_Homeland crew can't wait to join you! Chip in and join us! https://t.co/DyUkVGG6c8 https://t.co/cRe1Y0sTEG

.@JoeBiden Biden is right! We need @GaryPeters Peters back in the Senate so we can keep fighting side by side for Michigan families! https://t.co/g01Pi3wGWT

We’ve made so much progress. By staying united in 2018 we built a blue wave that carried Michigan Democrats to victory everywhere from Congress to the Governor’s office. If we keep standing together I know we can do it again in 2020. Let’s go vote! https://t.co/qgaWWoWxIp

This is what supporting @RealDonaldTrump  2000% sounds like! Like Donald Trump @JohnJamesMI is playing politics with health care in the middle of a pandemic. Health care is personal not political.  Michigan deserves better! https://t.co/tAhF3JFtSH

Fun to be with my friend @MagicJohnson tonight at our old stomping grounds- Lansing Everett HS. @ElissaSlotkin and @GaryPeters joined in our get-out-the-vote rally. It’s time to vote! #MIEarlyVote https://t.co/TLVNJirb0R
@DougJones @PodSaveAmerica @TVietor08 @jonfavs @danpfeiffer Go get ‘em Doug!  We need you in the Senate!

Great to be campaigning today with my friend and MY State Rep. Angela Whitwer! We were in my mom’s old neighborhood  So good to see old friends! Please join me in voting for Angela. She’s a champion for health care and we need her in Lansing! #MiEarlyVote https://t.co/oY4IjgtpHj

A vote for Amy Coney Barrett is a vote to take health care away from millions of Americans during a pandemic. Michigan has already lost nearly 7000 souls to this horrific disease. We deserve better! https://t.co/L8bo7yorbV
Love your PJs Dana! #MIEarlyVote https://t.co/XuF9uMQgXZ
Thank you for having our backs @GaryPeters we will have yours this November! https://t.co/gd1KRv0p0w

The vote is our power as citizens of the United States. Please join me in voting early! https://t.co/LLdkc0iYjo #MIEarlyVote
Please RT! Vote Bridget Mary McCormack and Elizabeth Welch for the Michigan Supreme Court! #MIEarlyVote https://t.co/y6r34aGcBG

YesterdayI stopped at my local clerk's office and dropped off my ballot!  I can't remember a more important year to vote straight Democratic!  I also proudly cast my vote for Justice Bridget McCormack and Elizabeth Welch for the Michigan Supreme Court. #MIEarlyVote https://t.co/PaVWO1IMck

@brianschatz @CoryBooker @ChrisMurphyCT @GaryPeters @chelseaperetti You know I’m in! We need @GaryPeters so he and I can keep being Michigan’s 1-2 punch in the Senate! Come on everyone let’s pitch in and help Gary reach this $200k goal! https://t.co/rwVNE3EAUl
What?? If there ever was a year to vote straight Democrat it’s this one! https://t.co/ekjJkfy9DB

Horrifying. Thank you @dananessel @MichStatePolice @FBI & U.S. attorneys from Detroit and Grand Rapids for stopping this terrorist plot & keeping @GovWhitmer & her family safe. Governor thank you for your incredible strength in this difficult time for Michigan & our country.

Thank you @KamalaHarris! You've always been there for us - I know  Michigan will be there for you and @JoeBiden this November!  (Photo taken in Detroit in 2018) #VPDebate2020 #VicePresidentialDebate #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/JgRf4sVSL5

.@KamalaHarris is right. When Michigan needed @Mike_Pence the most he voted to bankrupt our auto industry. Thank goodness @JoeBiden and @BarackObama were there to stop him! #Debates2020 #VPDebate #VicePresidentialDebate2020

I know Dr. @BarbaraBollier. As a State Senator and a Doctor protecting healthcare is her life’s work! It’s exactly what what we need right now. Come on Michigan please  chip in and help Democrats take back the Senate! https://t.co/EmB1MQhDsG
Yes! @MichelleObama is right. Michigan we have to vote for @JoeBiden as if our lives depend on it. Let's get to work and vote! https://t.co/TK9BoEemgj
Well deserved!! @ElissaSlotkin @HaleyLive https://t.co/8bq7wOIDeK
Thank you @Erimoore9! Another Michigander for @DrAlGrossAK cc: @brianschatz @ChrisMurphy @DickDurbin @SherrodBrown https://t.co/njxmt7kfw7
I’m in! It’s more important than ever to take back the Senate and protect our health care. Let’s go Michigan! https://t.co/km0YDmS2Nv
Donald Trump's refusal to denounce white supremacist groups is a national disgrace. Michigan we can't let him have four more years -- go vote. You can do it today! https://t.co/IgyqZuvlKo

Did @RealDonaldTrump really say at #Debates2020 that Michigan had our best year ever?  Wrong. Since January 2017 Michigan has lost over 57000 manufacturing jobs - including a net loss of auto manufacturing jobs  even before the pandemic. Michiganders deserve better!
I’m all in @BrianSchatz and @ChrisMurphyCT. Michigan is all in let’s take back Texas! https://t.co/ZHX219AxMU

Yes! 👏👏👏👏   ⬇️  "@GaryPeters has been a worthy heir to Michigan's remarkable legacy of bipartisan leadership. Peters has achieved more in his first term than many senators accomplish in their careers." https://t.co/lpKOQo79Ml

It is for that reason and the fact that I believe Michigan voters should have a say through their vote in selecting the next Supreme Court Justice that I am opposing Amy Coney Barrett’s nomination and will do everything I can to stop it! (3/3)
Her record makes it perfectly clear:  a vote for Amy Coney Barrett is a vote to dismantle our health care system - in the middle of a pandemic! (2/3)

Should she become our next Justice Amy Coney Barrett will decide cases that impact millions of lives. This is urgently true because immediately after the election the Supreme Court will hear a Donald Trump backed case that could overturn the Affordable Care Act. (1/3)

Today Ruth Bader Ginsburg became the first woman to ever lie in state at the U.S. Capitol. Honored to be a part of that history for a woman who was a hero to millions including me. https://t.co/ISLNrS1rpA
Thank you RBG. Please watch. https://t.co/rv0U0Tx3hX
If we win Mississippi Democrats can fire Mitch McConnell! It’s a close race and  @MikeEspyMS needs our help. Please pitch in if you can! Cc: @brianschatz https://t.co/Ws9IIMf8q0

This morning I was on @MSNBC talking about the Supreme Court and what it means for health care and our way of life as Americans in 2021 and beyond. Please watch: https://t.co/LdvSkd7MhU

Ruth Bader Ginsburg was a hero to millions of women including me because she walked the walk. Through her work and her example she made an indelible mark on our courts and our country.  I am forever grateful for her service. #ThankyouRBG.

Every time @realDonaldTrump tried to take away Great Lakes funding @GaryPeters was right there fighting by my side to stop him. Gary has Michigan's back let's make sure we have his this November! https://t.co/m3h5XBtfZQ
Thank you for being in West Michigan @DrBiden! You will be an incredible First Lady! https://t.co/6IDsOvIzph

Catastrophic floods in Michigan fires burning out west. So what does @RealDonaldTrump do? He appoints a climate change denier to lead an agency conducting critical climate change research. Future generations are counting on us to vote him out this fall! https://t.co/GSb1EJP56w
While @RealDonaldTrump and @Mike_Pence were cheering for bankruptcy the @JoeBiden led auto rescue saved more than a million jobs!
It’s not even close. Unlike @RealDonaldTrump @JoeBiden has always delivered for Michigan. He led us through the Great Recession the auto rescue and H1N1.

In Warren in 2016 @RealDonaldTrump told Michiganders “if I’m elected you won’t lose one plant.” 4 years later the truth is the opposite. @RealDonaldTrump is the first President in generations to oversee a NET JOB LOSS!
.@JoeBiden showed again today at his campaign stop in Warren why Michiganders will overwhelmingly choose him over @RealDonaldTrump this November.
Happy Birthday Sandy! Thanks for being a wonderful role-model & friend to so many of us! https://t.co/H97PJyNquz
This man should not be our Commander-in-Chief. Shameful! Our men and women in military service deserve so much more! https://t.co/1yvPVrtihf
Why is the Trump Administration doing this when it’s so important that our children be able to return to school safely??  Makes no sense...  https://t.co/1seHe6rdYn

A beautiful tribute. My heart goes out to everyone who has lost a loved one to COVID19. It truly did not have to be this bad...if only @realDonaldTrump had taken this virus seriously earlier.    https://t.co/EWN2FbrOZo

Today on the 57th anniversary of the March on Washington thousands are marching once again. To everyone who marched yesterday and today I’m proud to stand with you in the continuing fight for justice and equality! Enough is enough! #MarchOnWashington
Yes the Trump Admin effort to slow down the mail and create chaos is real! Thanks @GaryPeters for leading this fight! https://t.co/fdew0N8BXy
Powerful and Inspiring. Now is the time to stand together and say “no more! https://t.co/qhJxaESI9q

I am proud to serve as the first woman to represent Michigan in the U.S. Senate. This #WomensEqualityDay we know that the fight for equality isn't over. As we mark 100 years from the adoption of the 19th Amendment make a plan to vote early! Text VOTE to 30330 now.
Shark week might be over but at least it’s your birthday @GretchenWhitmer! Hope you have a great day! 🦈 🍰 💥 ! https://t.co/3S9jwsdfw8
I’m working my heart out to elect Joe and he needs your help too! If you haven't yet please go to https://t.co/oU3hfE0G7a and contribute to his campaign! #DNC2020
I know Joe can lead us out of this crisis and get our country on track again. He’ll never stop fighting for our Michigan values and way of life. He’s done it his whole life.   #DNC2020
This is a historic crossroads for our country. Tonight Joe Biden showed why he’s uniquely qualified to meet the challenges our country faces head on as our next President. #DNC2020
You heard @KamalaHarris! Let’s fight with conviction. Let’s fight with hope. Let’s go vote! #DNC2020 #DemocraticConvention https://t.co/ahAbhUam8U
So heartfelt. So true. So inspiring. Thank you @MichelleObama - fired up and ready to go! #demconvention #DNC2020 https://t.co/UQjR1QehmZ

🤯https://t.co/DkUTS6xHVM

Alert: Today @realDonaldTrump admitted to Fox that he’s sabotaging the Postal Service to make it harder to vote. He's attacking our democracy & the millions of Michiganders who count on the post office. Please speak out! We must find a way to stop him! https://t.co/T6llzeKo25

That's the Kamala Harris I know. And if we help her become our next Vice President I know she'll be an incredible partner for Joe Biden and the people of Michigan.  #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/IlhgG06el4

In 2018 Kamala came to Michigan to support my campaign. That whole day in Detroit she was fun inspiring and above all the best partner I could possibly ask for. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/TxXNnU9P3y
I wanted to share a personal memory about @KamalaHarris. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/2T3iJndl0O
Like @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris gets Michigan and will be there every day for our families.

I am very excited for my friend @KamalaHarris. Working side by side with her in the Senate I see her competence compassion & ability to get things done. She‘ll hit the ground running and is ready to lead on day one. https://t.co/EwYNZ4bckM
Happy Birthday @DanKildee! I hope you get a chance to relax and celebrate with your family today.  Looking forward to the day where I can give you a real hug again.  🎊🎁🎉🎂 https://t.co/KFuYZufCp0
Congratulations Dr.Mona! Your courage and dedication have saved lives!  Honored to be your partner. https://t.co/x3R0SNY7tD
Wishing my friend @Andy_Levin the happiest of birthdays! Michigan and the 9th district are so lucky to have you during this difficult time! 🎂 🎁 🍰
Happy Birthday President @BarackObama! Thank you for always being there for Michigan. Proud to have you as our friend! https://t.co/WjH9AdrTi9
You will be able to vote in person on Election Day. Polls will be open from 7 a.m. to 8 p.m. ET. You can find your polling place here: https://t.co/quwMNHdqdx

If you completed an absentee ballot but haven't mailed it yet it's strongly recommended to drop your ballot off in-person at your local clerk. Only ballots received in the clerk's office before polls close will be counted. Find your local clerk here: https://t.co/GJg5HlNdsn

All registered voters have the right to vote by mail. Because Election Day is so close it's recommended that you request and complete your absentee ballot at your local clerk's office: https://t.co/GJg5HlNdsn

You can register to vote at your local clerk's office through Election Day. Michigan allows for same day voter registration. To check your voter registration status or to see a list of acceptable documents to bring when you register please head here: https://t.co/hODI210BL5
August 4th is Election Day in Michigan! If you're looking for complete information on voting please head to https://t.co/myDv0LoAKz. Here's a thread of important details to help you get ready.
The Challenge: Post a photo of yourself wearing a mask and nominate someone else to do the same.  I nominate @ElissaSlotkin!    #MaskUpAmerica https://t.co/HwFaJ7nWQ7 https://t.co/lXEArgjA4g
I'm with Chris - @GaryPeters is all about substance and getting things done. He has our backs let's make sure we have his this November! https://t.co/DHdyU32dgO
John Lewis was a hero in every sense of the word. He lived fearlessly and we are a better nation for it. Sending love and condolences to his family. https://t.co/mPT2l0katX
